name: CropDusters!
description:
Theme - Roots

Play as a dynamic scarecrow-radish duo as you fight off the hordes of hungry animals!

This is a singleplayer game where you control two characters - one is a radish who can't move but has the ability to sling shots at enemies, and the other is a scarecrow who can't attack but has the ability to throw the radish around.

----------------------

(Gamepad required)

Move Scarecrow - Left Stick

Aim Radish - Right Stick

Shoot (hold to charge)  -  RT, left face button
Grab/throw - Right face button

Reset - Select

----------------------

Chris Pugliese - Programming

Annabel Prodnuk - Art

Allan Tan - Music/SFX
